original_title: Blurring the Color Line: Chinese in the Segregated South
overview: "BLURRING THE COLOR LINE opens up critical conversations on where the Chinese community fit into the black and white dichotomy of the segregated south, how anti-Blackness was established and perpetuated, and how marginal groups were pitted against each other in the hierarchical structure of white supremacy."
title: Blurring the Color Line: Chinese in the Segregated South
